mapper.insert: insert into pay_order(user_id, product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, market_type,market_deduction_amount,pay_amount,create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{orderId}, #{orderTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{status},#{marketType},#{marketDeductionAmount},#{payAmount}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, pay_url, market_type,market_deduction_amount,pay_amount from pay_order where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId} order by id desc limit 1
